node.description: [string]Node where to attach the hellpod rack payload.

deploy_animation_event.description: [string]Animation to play when retracting this attach.

retract_animation_event.description: [string]Animation to play when retracting this attach.

apply_deltas.description: [bool]If true, apply any stratagem customization deltas to this entity when spawning.

rack_side.description: Is this item on the left or right side of the rack? Cannot be left on None.
